text: Denmark seem to be completely losing control of the situation. More restrictions were added earlier in December, but the numbers kept rising nevertheless. We now have nearly twice the number of hospitalized as we did at the spring peak, and the Christmas infections hasn't even hit yet. We are about to have the new year's evening parties, which are traditionally drunk and disinhibited, and this with a population already weary of the restrictions. New restrictions will be announced by the prime minister in one hour. Unless restrictions are truly draconian, I expect the situation to completely derail the next two weeks.

text: No new restrictions, but existing restrictions from December are prolonged to Jan 17th. Government seems worried. There must be some good reason they don't escalate, maybe economic, they don't say.
